PATIENT_ID: TEST_DVT_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 12:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 12:30:00
Patient admitted for pneumonia. Complained of right leg pain on day 3.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-23 10:00:00
VENOUS DUPLEX RIGHT LOWER EXTREMITY

FINDINGS:
Normal venous flow and compressibility throughout the right lower extremity.
No evidence of deep vein thrombosis.

IMPRESSION:
Negative for DVT.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-23 11:00:00
Imaging negative for DVT. Leg pain likely musculoskeletal. Continue monitoring.
